name: Menu of Memoirs
description:
You just opened a humble cafe that does take-out deliveries. Customers from various walks of life will come with different requests/food recipes with a personal story to tell. To get good ratings, you must talk with their customer and prepare the meal at the same time. 

Save the fading memories of Singapore! Make a menu by keeping the dishes everyone has memories of.

Credits 

Ian Ngoh - Programmer, Sound Designer

Beatrice Tan - Production Coordinator, Story and Research

Artists -
Amanda Low, Aahan Tiwari, Purvi Deshmukh
